name: Human Minion
action: Instant and contested; target rolls Resolve + Gnosis reflexively
effect: The mage exerts gross bodily control over human beings. As per the Life 4 Animal Minion spell. The mage controls the affected creature like a marionette. Unlike an animal, a human cannot be made to do anything that endangers his survival or that might harm him. Also, if he is made to do something that is radically against his beliefs (such as harm his lover), a fresh contested and reflexive Resolve + Gnosis roll is made to resist the command (his successes must exceed the spell's Potency).

rotes.roteDescription: With this magic, even the mightiest foe can be turned to the service of a Ladder mage. Guardians of the Veil also use a version of this rote to control the actions of others when needed.
